Great game for Esports. free version is full of cheaters.

I used to play 1.6, Source and now GO and I loved the game.
I will even ignore all the gambling, microtransactions etc. to squeeze out money from silly people - that's just business.
However, I reached to a point where I am just tired of all the cheaters in comp and the lack of punishment for them (all that overwatch etc. is useless), they take out all the pleasure from the game.
So that's where I am right now hence uninstalling and posting this review, not out of anger but more because of the disappointment.
